solution_line_template: Three dimes is equal to ${dimes_trade_value} because {dimes_per_trade} x {dime_value} = <<{dimes_per_trade}*{dime_value}={dimes_trade_value}>>{dimes_trade_value}
Seven nickels is equal to ${nickels_trade_value} because {nickels_per_trade} x {nickel_value} = <<{nickels_per_trade}*{nickel_value}={nickels_trade_value}>>{nickels_trade_value}
Each time he trades with dimes he lose ${loss_per_dime_trade} because {dimes_trade_value} - {quarter_value} = <<{dimes_trade_value}-{quarter_value}={loss_per_dime_trade}>>{loss_per_dime_trade}

Each time he traded with nickels he lost ${loss_per_nickel_trade} because {nickels_trade_value} - {quarter_value} = <<{nickels_trade_value}-{quarter_value}={loss_per_nickel_trade}>>{loss_per_nickel_trade}
He lost ${total_loss_dimes} from trading with dimes because {num_dime_trades} x {loss_per_dime_trade} =<<{num_dime_trades}*{loss_per_dime_trade}={total_loss_dimes}>>{total_loss_dimes}

He lost ${total_loss_nickels} from trading with nickels because {num_nickel_trades} x {loss_per_nickel_trade} = <<{num_nickel_trades}*{loss_per_nickel_trade}={total_loss_nickels}>>{total_loss_nickels}
